title: 2 Beds 1 Bath Apartment
posting_body: Spacious two bedroom, one bath apartment in the heart of Little Italy.
Rent is $1,250 per month (water, sewer and HEAT included, you pay gas and electric).
Rental application and background check are required.
Apartment includes private balcony, original hardwood floors, large kitchen with dishwasher, updated appliances and great views of the neighborhood.
Newer furnace and water tank, has been freshly painted, and lots of storage throughout.
Minutes from restaurants, shopping, museums, orchestra, hospitals, public transportation, CWRU, CIA, CIM, and much more.
Directly across the street from coin laundromat.
